titleStmt.title: The life of Henry Chichele, Archbishop of Canterbury, who lived in the times of Henry the V. and VI. Kings of England written in Latin by Arth. Duck ; now made English and a table of contents annexed.
Vita Henrici Chichele archiepiscopi Cantuariensis sub regibus Henrico V. et VI. English
titleStmt.author: Duck, Arthur, Sir, 1580-1648.

titleStmt.title: The life of Henry Chichele, Archbishop of Canterbury, who lived in the times of Henry the V. and VI. Kings of England written in Latin by Arth. Duck ; now made English and a table of contents annexed.
Vita Henrici Chichele archiepiscopi Cantuariensis sub regibus Henrico V. et VI. English

notesStmt.note: Translation of Vita Henrici Chichele archiepiscopi Cantuariensis sub regibus Henrico V. et VI.
This English translation is somewhat fuller than the Latin original. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
